channel.title: Trolling
channel.description: Back in the day, there were no trolls on MITB (or moparscape), but in todays world, it seems regardless if your post is knowledgeable or not, you will get trolled. I really wish this weren't the case, but it seems the higher your post count gets, the smarter you think you are (with exceptions of course). Anyone else notice this? All points of view welcome.

item.title: Trolling
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Thread closed. If you guys want to discuss the multiple accounts rule, feel free to post a topic about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Trolling
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Tico, post:29, topic:339699”][quote author=c|p link=topic=436076.msg3203625#msg3203625 date=1273584593]

Date Registered: March 13, 2010, 12:05:52 PM

FUCK OFF YOU NEWFAG
[/quote]You are right. There is NOOOO possible way that I could have been here any time before march 13th 2010. That’s when this account was registered, it couldn’t have gotten pruned due to inactivity… Hmm. 15 year olds are smart.

Oh, multiple accounts? Alright, thanks for giving me a reason to ban you, Korvin.

because you definitely can’t browse the forum as a guest right?

worst moderator ever.

Did you miss the “Korvin” there? Perhaps you should’ve looked a little closer. Clearly I checked for multiple accounts before banning him.[/quote]
so you’re saying that he had an account with one post (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=361263) and then he stopped using it for some unknown reason and created a new one called koolvin? is that really a reason to ban someone, or did you just do it because he was an idiot?

Read full topic

item.title: Trolling
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Or he could have been lying, trying to say he has been here a while, TBH I don’t see that the ban should be as enforced as there is no proof apart from his word.

It’s like me saying, “I was once admin on these forums”, which is a blatant lie though people who are non-the-wiser would believe me.

Unless there is more proof that I do not have?

Read full topic

item.title: Trolling
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Well looking at his apparent claims, it may be worth addressing the fact he’s blatantly wrong
Anyone who let’s their post count effect their ego is an obnoxious douche.

Look at the top 10 posters, I’d say half of them are there because they like to hit the enter key to often.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Out of the top posters, there’s way less than half there branded “elitist”. In this entire topic people reacted as if he was right*. Oh, all except lawl. Although I suppose he would fall under elitist brand and the other posters fall under the lesser better regarded category. Tehehe.

[size=5pt]*Not taking into account you were all distracted by some off-topic comment from Tico about flexing his ban power.[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Trolling
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Psst, learn identifying trolls.

[quote=“Koolvin, post:44, topic:339478”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=435864.msg3203367#msg3203367 date=1273539398]
Don’t feed the troll, Koolvin go work at Geek Squad you will fit right in.
[/quote]Don’t be the troll and make dim-witted comments. A job is a job, I wasn’t asking for your opinion on the geek squad, I was asking where I should look for a job.[/quote]

NEED I SAY MORE? No.

Read full topic

item.title: Trolling
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

there aren’t more trolls, just a lot of people are starting to claim that they’re trolling when they make a fool of themselves and cause an angry reply. and i think you’re mistaking sarcasm for trolling, too.

[quote=“Frell, post:5, topic:339699”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=436076.msg3203429#msg3203429 date=1273545997]

Honestly its the way this community is. What i’ve learned:
Don’t ask questions
Don’t question someone else
Don’t give your own opinion
Don’t try to help someone

Your best bet is to browse.

ur a moron fuck off
[/quote]
AHAHAHA I TROLLED U GUUUUDD[/quote]

Read full topic

I CLAIM TO BE A CERTIFIED WEB DEVELOPER, YET DONT HAVE THE FAINTEST CLUE ON HOW TO PROPERLY CREATE A SITE WITHOUT IT LOOKING LIKE SHIT AND BEING INVALID ON ALL (X)HTML/CSS VALIDATORS

IM ALSO LOOKING FOR A JOB AS A TECHNICIAN WHEN I DONT EVEN KNOW HOW TO INCREASE THE BRIGHTNESS ON MY OPERATING SYSTEM

edit: OH ALSO, I OPENLY ADMIT TO HAVING MULTIPLE ACCOUNTS ON THESE FORUMS EVEN THOUGH I KNOW THAT WILL RESULT IN MY BAN, SEEMS TO BE MY EGOCENTRIC NEED FOR ATTENTION CANT GET ENOUGH

Don’t ask questions
Don’t question someone else
Don’t give your own opinion
Don’t try to help someone

Your best bet is to browse.
